title: Haleakalā National Park: Education
body: Student looking through a magnifying glass with a ranger. NPS  Haleakalā: The Ultimate Classroom Haleakalā National Park spans from sea level to 10,023 feet, encompassing diverse ecosystems from tropical rain forests to alpine deserts.In the natural laboratory of the park, students can experience the culture, history, geology, and unique biological wonders that make Haleakalā special. Find lesson plans, plan your field trip, and more as you use Haleakalā as your classroom!
